info.title: idocs api document
info.description:
Use this API to cancel a user's authorization to a merchant. The access token becomes invalid after Alipay receives the revoke request, and the merchant can no longer access the user resource scope with the access token. In addition, the merchant cannot use the related refresh token to obtain a new access token. 

Structure

A message consists of a header and body. The following sections are focused on the body structure. For the header structure, see£º 

  • Request header 
  • Response header 

Note: Set the data type of each field (except array) as String. This means that you must use double quotation marks (" ") to enclose the field value. Examples:

If the data type of a field is Integer and its value is 20, set it as "20". 

If the data type of a field is Boolean and its value is true, set it as "true".
info.descriptionLake:
Use this API to cancel a user's authorization to a merchant. The access token becomes invalid after Alipay receives the revoke request, and the merchant can no longer access the user resource scope with the access token. In addition, the merchant cannot use the related refresh token to obtain a new access token. 

Structure

A message consists of a header and body. The following sections are focused on the body structure. For the header structure, see£º 

  • Request header 
  • Response header 

Note: Set the data type of each field (except array) as String. This means that you must use double quotation marks (" ") to enclose the field value. Examples:

If the data type of a field is Integer and its value is 20, set it as "20". 

If the data type of a field is Boolean and its value is true, set it as "true".

accessToken.description: The access token that is used to access the corresponding scope of the user resource.
accessToken.descriptionLake: The access token that is used to access the corresponding scope of the user resource.

resultCode.description: Result code. Possible values are listed in the Result/Error codes table on this page.
resultCode.descriptionLake: Result code. Possible values are listed in the Result/Error codes table on this page.

resultStatus.description:
Result status. Valid values are:

  • S: Indicates that this API is called successfully and the authorization is canceled successfully.
  • F: Indicates that this API call failed. The authorization cancelation failed.
  • U: Indicates that the call status of this API is unknown. Retry the call process.
resultStatus.descriptionLake:
Result status. Valid values are:

  • S: Indicates that this API is called successfully and the authorization is canceled successfully.
  • F: Indicates that this API call failed. The authorization cancelation failed.
  • U: Indicates that the call status of this API is unknown. Retry the call process.

resultMessage.description: Result message that explains the result code.
resultMessage.descriptionLake: Result message that explains the result code.

result.description: Indicates whether this API is called successfully. If this API is successfully called, the authorization is canceled successfully.
result.descriptionLake: Indicates whether this API is called successfully. If this API is successfully called, the authorization is canceled successfully.

result.resultMessage: The access token is expired, revoked, or does not exist.

x-result.action: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.
x-result.actionLake: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.

x-result.message: The client is not authorized to use this API.
x-result.action: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.
x-result.actionLake: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.

x-result.message: The access token is expired, revoked, or does not exist.
x-result.action: Check whether accessToken is correct. If not correct, pass in the correct value. If correct, contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.
x-result.actionLake: Check whether accessToken is correct. If not correct, pass in the correct value. If correct, contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.

x-result.message: The called API is invalid or not active.
x-result.action: Contact Alipay Technical Support to resolve the issue.
x-result.actionLake: Contact Alipay Technical Support to resolve the issue.

x-result.action: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.
x-result.actionLake: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.

x-result.message: The signature is not validated. The private key used to sign a request does not match the public key of Antom Dashboard.
x-result.action:
Check whether the private key used to sign a request matches the public key of Antom Dashboard. The following signature references are useful:

  • The signature field in a request header 
  • How to calculate a signature
x-result.actionLake:
Check whether the private key used to sign a request matches the public key of Antom Dashboard. The following signature references are useful:

  • The signature field in a request header 
  • How to calculate a signature

x-result.message: The private key or public key of Antom or the merchant is not found.
x-result.action: Check whether the private key or public key exists. If not, upload the private key in Antom Dashboard.
x-result.actionLake: Check whether the private key or public key exists. If not, upload the private key in Antom Dashboard.

x-result.action: Check whether the URL is correct. Please refer to the endpoint in the API documentation.
x-result.actionLake: Check whether the URL is correct. Please refer to the endpoint in the API documentation.

x-result.action: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.
x-result.actionLake: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.

x-result.message: The required parameters are not passed, or illegal parameters exist. For example, a non-numeric input, an invalid date, or the length and type of the parameter are wrong.
x-result.action: Check and verify whether the required request fields (including the header fields and body fields) of the current API are correctly passed and valid.
x-result.actionLake: Check and verify whether the required request fields (including the header fields and body fields) of the current API are correctly passed and valid.

x-result.action: Do not retry. Human intervention is usually needed. It is recommended that you contact Alipay Technical Support to troubleshoot the issue.
x-result.actionLake: Do not retry. Human intervention is usually needed. It is recommended that you contact Alipay Technical Support to troubleshoot the issue.

x-result.action: Do not retry, and contact Alipay Technical Support for more details.
x-result.actionLake: Do not retry, and contact Alipay Technical Support for more details.

x-result.action: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.
x-result.actionLake: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.

x-result.message: The request traffic exceeds the limit.
x-result.action: Call the interface again to resolve the issue. If not resolved, contact Alipay Technical Support.
x-result.actionLake: Call the interface again to resolve the issue. If not resolved, contact Alipay Technical Support.

x-result.message: An API call has failed, which is caused by unknown reasons.
x-result.action: Call the interface again to resolve the issue. If not resolved, contact Alipay Technical Support.
x-result.actionLake: Call the interface again to resolve the issue. If not resolved, contact Alipay Technical Support.

post.x-more:
Result process logic

For different request results, different actions are to be performed. See the following list for details:

  • If the value of result.resultStatus is S, the authorization is successfully canceled. The access token cannot be used to access the user's resources anymore. In addition, the relative refreshToken cannot be used to update accessToken anymore.
  • If the value of result.resultStatus is F, system defects or system failure occurred. It is suggested to check the system manually and take actions according to the result code.
  • If the value of result.resultStatus is U, the call status of this API is unknown. Retry the process by calling this API again.

  • If the value of result.resultStatus is F, system defects or system failure occurred. It is suggested to check the system manually and take actions according to the result code.
  • If the value of result.resultStatus is U, the call status of this API is unknown. Retry the process by calling this API again.
